thread.title: Sports Briefing | Tennis: Djokovic and Murray Win
thread.title_full: Sports Briefing | Tennis: Djokovic and Murray Win

author: THE ASSOCIATED PRESS
title: Sports Briefing | Tennis: Djokovic and Murray Win
text: Continue reading the main story Novak Djokovic reached the quarterfinals of the Shanghai Masters with a 6-2, 6-3 win over Feliciano López. Andy Murray saved all seven break points he faced and beat John Isner, 6-7 (4), 6-4, 6-4, and Rafael Nadal defeated Milos Raonic, 6-3, 7-6 (3). Kei Nishikori was upset by Kevin Anderson, 7-6 (10), 7-6 (3). ■ Venus Williams advanced to the quarterfinals of the Hong Kong Open by beating Wang Yafan, 6-0, 6-2. Williams will next play Alizé Cornet, who defeated Yaroslava Shvedova, 6-7 (4), 6-3, 6-4. ■ Caroline Wozniacki became the latest seeded player to have an early exit at the Generali Ladies in Linz, Austria, losing to Kirsten Flipkens, 6-4, 6-4. Wozniacki’s defeat left the event without any of its top six seeded women in the quarterfinals. A version of this brief appears in print on October 16, 2015, on page B12 of the New York edition with the headline: Djokovic and Murray Win. Order Reprints | Today's Paper | Subscribe Loading...
